name: Financial Inclusion Centre
goal: FIC's mission is to promote financial markets that work for society. We undertake research into financial markets and develop policy recommendations for making financial markets work for society
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Environment
euInitiatives: EU legislative and regulatory initiatives in relation to financial services. For example, CMU, Sustainable Finance, financial inclusion, digitilisation, pension reform.
